code: public void checkClientTrusted(X509Certificate[] chain, String authType) throws CertificateException {     // everything is trusted     logCertificateChain("Client", chain). }
public void checkServerTrusted(X509Certificate[] chain, String authType) throws CertificateException {     // everything is trusted     logCertificateChain("Server", chain). }
public X509Certificate[] getAcceptedIssuers() {     // everything is trusted     return new X509Certificate[0]. }

private static void logCertificateChain(String type, X509Certificate[] chain) {     if (LOG.isDebugEnabled()) {         for (X509Certificate certificate : chain) {             LOG.debug("{} certificate is trusted: {}", type, certificate).         }     } }
